statements: UPDATE messages SET is_read = TRUE WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'New Message' WHERE sender_id = 98765 AND receiver_id = 54321;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'Updated message text', is_read = true WHERE message_id = 123;
UPDATE messages SET sender_id = 456, receiver_id = 789, message_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE receiver_id = 123;
UPDATE instructors SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE messages SET message_text='Hello from Alice' WHERE message_id=5;
UPDATE instructors SET bio='Experienced Python developer with 10+ years of industry experience' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE messages SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id=2 AND receiver_id=3;
UPDATE Instructors SET email='john.doe@example.com', instructor_name='John Doe' WHERE instructor_id=1;
